department: Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, NSRIT Autonomous
description: A 3-day hands-on workshop focused on the Internet of Things (IoT) and its various applications.
additional_info: This workshop is organized by the Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, NSRIT Autonomous. NSRIT is NAAC Accredited with Grade A and affiliated with the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE).
raw_text: NAAC Accredited with Grade A NSRIT AUTONOMOUS INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (ISTE) DEPARTMENT OF ELECTRONICS AND COMMUNICATION ENGINEERING 3 Day Hands on Workshop on "IoT & Its Applications" Date : 22nd to 24th September, 2025
